locales.plugin_description: Votes for a map and displays current score of it.
locales.slash_chat_karma_description: Shows karma for the current map
locales.slash_chat_playervote_plus_description: Increases karma for the current map
locales.slash_chat_playervote_minus_description: Decreases karma for the current map
locales.list_help: {#server}» {#emotic}Use {#highlite}/list{#emotic} first - Type {#highlite}/list help{#emotic} for more info.
locales.jukebox_notfound: {#server}» {#emotic}Map_ID not found - Type {#highlite}/list{#emotic} to see all maps.
locales.karma_require: {#server}» {#error}You need to finish this map at least {#highlite}$i {1}{#error} time(s) before voting!
locales.karma_voted: {#server}» {#highlite}You have already voted for this map
locales.karma_nopublic: {#server}» {#error}Public karma votes disabled, use $i{#highlite}/++{#error} or $i{#highlite}/--{#error} instead!
locales.karma_remind: {#server}» {#karma}Remember to vote karma ({#highlite}/++{#karma} or {#highlite}/--{#karma}) for this map
